price: 39. O mokolo yango, bato na bilima bakotunama te тропа masumu na bango(1).
arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
footnotes: 1 Mokapo oyo elakisi ete bakotunama te omokolo ya suka mpamba te masumu na bango eyebani.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fayawma-idhin lā yus'alu ʿan dhanbihi insun walā jānnun
